author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
originalTitle: The Metrical Preface to Waerferth's Translation of Gregory's Dialogues
englishTitle: The Metrical Preface to Waerferth's Translation of Gregory's Dialogues

text.1: he in me findan mæg,      gif hine feola lysteð
text.3: þæt he ful eaþe mæg      upp gestigan
text.4: to ðam heofonlican hame,      þar byð a hyht and wyn,
text.5: blis on burgum,      þam þe bearn godes
text.7: þæt mæg se mon begytan,      se þe his modgeðanc
text.8: æltowe byþ,      and þonne þurh his ingehygd
text.10: ond hiora bisene fulgað,      swa þeos boc sagað.
text.12: þeow and þearfa      þæs þe alne þrym aof,
text.15: Bideþ þe se bisceop,      se þe ðas boc begeat
text.16: þe þu on þinum handum nu      hafast and sceawast,
text.17: þæt þu him to þeossum halgum      helpe bidde,
text.18: þe heora gemynd her on      gemearcude siendon,
text.20: forgyu... þa gyltas      þe he geo worhte,
text.21: and eac resðe mid him,      se ðe ah ealles rices geweald,
text.22: and eac swa his beahgifan,      þe him ðas bysene forgeaf,
text.25: þara þe he sið oððe ær fore      secgan hyrde,
